meanings.definition: Makes (something) completely free from faults or defects.
meanings.sent1: She perfects her painting by fixing all the mistakes.
meanings.sent2: He always perfects his dance moves before the performance.
meanings.sent3: The chef perfects the recipe by adding a pinch of magic.
meanings.sent4: Practice perfects the skill like a sculptor shaping a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: Her attention to detail perfects every aspect of her work.

meanings.definition: Achieves the highest standard of excellence.
meanings.sent1: With hard work, he perfects his craft and becomes a master.
meanings.sent2: The team perfects their strategy to win the championship.
meanings.sent3: The student perfects his presentation and impresses the class.
meanings.sent4: Determination perfects the journey like a climber reaching the summit.
meanings.sent5: His dedication perfects every project he undertakes.

meanings.definition: Improves or refines (something) to make it flawless.
meanings.sent1: She perfects her essay by revising it multiple times.
meanings.sent2: The tailor perfects the fit of the dress for the bride.
meanings.sent3: The scientist perfects the experiment with a new approach.
meanings.sent4: Patience perfects the process like a jeweler polishing a gem.
meanings.sent5: His expertise perfects every design he creates.
